main.name: Hi,I'm Maryam
main.description: A Web Developer with a thorough understanding of web compatibility, performance, usability, accessibility, maintainability.I Do my best to develop web products which offer users a great experience
main.bio: I am a Frontend Developer ,a good friend, and a lover of all things fitness.Highly focused on learning and problem solving skills, for the past few years, I have worked with ecommerce ,promotional and institutional websites, marketplace and many other applications.Actually I work with Agile development and I have been learning with new experiences in huge projects improving my communication and my way of working in a workspace.Deep experience in Front End Development/Engineering, open source projects, specially strong skills with Javascript/React/HTML/CSS and  UX/UI Designer/Creative Architecture.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.degree: Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering
education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: javaScript
skills.description: javaScript was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template  which I used as a starting point.

skills.name: AMP
skills.description: AMP is a Google-backed project with the aim of speeding up the delivery of content through the use of stripped down code known as AMP HTML.There is a very compelling reason to do AMP for SEO. So Let's use it.

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects

skills.name: Bootstrap 4
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: HTML/CSS
skills.description: I started to play with design and then HTML and CSS since my 19 and from this time I already played a lot with websites. Test me, challenge me, and, I'll run through the problems to look for solutions
